column2: an A.M. Eatery////I'll describe all the cons before the pros. First
column3: I'd like to say that their parking lot is tiny so anticipate looking for street parking. Second
column4: the waits are long so come ready to be hangry by the time you are seated. Third
column5: they really need to add some kind of tint to their windows - the sunlight is particularly unforgiving if you get seated facing it.
